mapper.select: select g.id, g.`name`, g.images, g.member_id, mg.member_id as create_member_id, g.count from sys_member_group mg left join ( select g.id, g.name, g.images, g.member_id, gc.count from sys_group g left join (select id, count(1) as count from sys_group group by id) gc on g.id = gc.id ) g on mg.group_id = g.id where mg.member_id = #{memberId}
